data.prompt:
Magic: The Gathering card art.

Final Prompt: A nimble outrigger star-skiff, crafted from dark wood with subtle glowing tribal patterns and featuring a shimmering solar sail, gracefully navigates through a vibrant, bioluminescent coral nebula. A solitary Wayfinder, adorned with subtle glowing tattoos, stands confidently at the helm, their gaze fixed on the cosmic currents ahead, with a distant volcanic island-world visible against a starfield in the background.

Artist Credit: Inspired by Chris Rahn

Style: Fantasy illustration, detailed, painterly, dramatic lighting.
Do NOT include any text, card frames, or UI elements.
Focus on the subject matter only.
